title: PowerToFly Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from PowerToFly with complete details including salary, job type, location, and full descriptions. Search by keywords, location, or provide a direct PowerToFly URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific PowerToFly jobs URL. If provided, this will override keyword and location parameters.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job search keywords such as job titles, skills, or technologies (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Data Scientist', 'Product Manager').

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter jobs by location (e.g., 'New York', 'Remote', 'San Francisco'). Leave empty to search all locations.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: When enabled, the scraper visits each job detail page to extract complete information including full descriptions, salary, and job type.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract. Set a reasonable limit to control run time and costs.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of listing pages to crawl. Prevents excessive resource usage.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxies are recommended for reliable access to PowerToFly.
